subject: Horse Racing
American Pharoah (Race Horse)
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
lead_paragraph: American Pharoah’s sire, Pioneerof the Nile, is a picky stallion, but his breeding fees could soar if his offspring wins the Belmont Stakes and the Triple Crown.
snippet: American Pharoah’s sire, Pioneerof the Nile, is a picky stallion, but his breeding fees could soar if his offspring wins the Belmont Stakes and the Triple Crown.
